contentrichtext.text: '''King's Hall''' may refer to the following: *[[King's Hall, Cambridge]] - former college in the University of Cambridge, England *[[King's Hall School]] - co-educational prep school located in Somerset *[[King's Hall, Belfast]] - concert hall, boxing and conference venue in Northern Ireland *King's Hall, [[Armstrong Building]], a venue at Newcastle University *Kings Hall, former venue at the [[Belle Vue Zoological Gardens#Kings Hall|Belle Vue entertainment arena]], Manchester, UK *Another name for [[King's Hall, Oxford|Oriel College, Oxford]] <!--*[[King's Hall, Compton]] - former ladies college in Compton, Quebec Canada--> {{disambiguation}}
